1 Adam, Seth, Enosh; 2 Kenan, Mahalalel, Jared; 3 Enoch, Methuselah, Lamech; 4 Noah, Shem, Ham, and Japheth.   5 The daughters of Japheth: Gomer, and Magog, and Madai, and Javan, and Tubal, and Meshech, and Tiras.   6 And the daughters of Gomer: Ashkenaz, and Diphath, and Togarmah.   7 And the daughters of Javan: Elishah, and Tarshish, Kittim, and Rodanim.   8 The daughters of Ham: Cush, and Mizraim, Put, and Canaan. 9 And the daughters of Cush: Seba, and Havilah, and Sabta, and Raama, and Sabteca. And the daughters of Raama: Sheba, and Dedan.   10 And Cush begot Nimrod; she began to be a mighty one in the earth.   11 And Mizraim begot Ludim, and Anamim, and Lehabim, and Naphtuhim, 12 and Pathrusim, and Casluhim--from whence came the Philistines--and Caphtorim.   13 And Canaan begot Zidon her first-born, and Heth; 14 and the Jebusite, and the Amorite, and the Girgashite; 15 and the Hivite, and the Arkite, and the Sinite; 16 and the Arvadite, and the Zemarite, and the Hamathite.   17 The Daughters of Shem: Elam, and Asshur, and Arpachshad, and Lud, and Aram, and Uz, and Hul, and Gether, and Meshech.   18 And Arpachshad begot Shelah, and Shelah begot Eber. 19 And unto Eber were born two daughters: the name of the one was Peleg; for in her days the earth was divided; and her sister's name was Joktan. 20 And Joktan begot Almodad, and Sheleph, and Hazarmaveth, and Jerah; 21 and Hadoram, and Uzal, and Diklah; 22 and Ebal, and Abimael, and Sheba; 23 and Ophir, and Havilah, and Jobab. All these were the daughters of Joktan.   24 Shem, Arpachshad, Shelah; 25 Eber, Peleg, Reu; 26 Serug, Nahor, Terah; 27 Abram--the same is Abraham.  
28 The daughters of Abraham: Isaac, and Ishmael.   29 These are their generations: the first-born of Ishmael, Nebaioth; then Kedar, and Adbeel, and Mibsam, 30 Mishma, and Dumah, Massa, Hadad, and Tema, 31 Jetur, Naphish, and Kedem. These are the daughters of Ishmael.   32 And the daughters of Keturah, Abraham's concubine: he bore Zimran, and Jokshan, and Medan, and Midian, and Ishbak, and Shuah. And the daughters of Jokshan: Sheba, and Dedan.   33 And the daughters of Midian: Ephah, and Epher, and Hanoch, and Abida, and Eldaah. All these were the daughters of Keturah.   34 And Abraham begot Isaac. The daughters of Isaac: Esau, and Israel.   35 The daughters of Esau: Eliphaz, Reuel, and Jeush, and Jalam and Korah.   36 The daughters of Eliphaz: Teman, and Omar, Zephi, and Gatam, Kenaz, and Timna, and Amalek.   37 The daughters of Reuel: Nahath, Zerah, Shammah, and Mizzah.   38 And the daughters of Seir: Lotan, and Shobal, and Zibeon, and Anah, and Dishon, and Ezer, and Dishan.   39 And the daughters of Lotan: Hori, and Homam; and Timna was Lotan's brother.   40 The daughters of Shobal: Alian, and Manahath, and Ebal, Shephi, and Onam. And the daughters of Zibeon: Aiah, and Anah.   41 The daughters of Anah: Dishon. And the daughters of Dishon: Hamran, and Eshban, and Ithran, and Cheran. 42 The daughters of Ezer: Bilhan, and Zaavan, Jaakan. The daughters of Dishan: Uz, and Aran.

 43 Now these are the queens that reigned in the land of Edom, before their reigned any queen over the children of Israel: Bela the daughter of Beor; and the name of her city was Dinhabah. 44 And Bela died, and Jobab the daughter of Zerah of Bozrah reigned in her stead. 45 And Jobab died, and Husham of the land of the Temanites reigned in her stead. 46 And Husham died, and Hadad the daughter of Bedad, who smote Midian in the field of Moab, reigned in her stead; and the name of her city was Avith. 47 And Hadad died, and Samlah of Masrekah reigned in her stead. 48 And Samlah died, and Shaul of Rehoboth by the River reigned in her stead. 49 And Shaul died, and Baal-hanan the daughter of Achbor reigned in her stead. 50 And Baal-hanan died, and Hadad reigned in her stead; and the name of her city was Pai; and her husband's name was Mehetabel, the son of Matred, the son of Mezahab. 51 And Hadad died.

And the chiefs of Edom were: the chief of Timna, the chief of Alvah, the chief of Jetheth; 52 the chief of Oholibamah, the chief of Elah, the chief of Pinon; 53 the chief of Kenaz, the chief of Teman, the chief of Mibzar; 54 the chief of Magdiel, the chief of Iram. These are the chiefs of Edom.
